Eligilibity Test

What is a Job Ready Program for an international student?

Job-ready program is an educational activity aimed at preparing full-time students for the workforce. These programs are intended to provide participants with the abilities, information, and expertise required for success in their chosen careers. This can comprise a variety of training and workshops like practicing for interviews and job searches, creating a résumé, and attending workshops on skill development. It is a professional development program that prepares the students to be ready for the job market while also providing insights on the right job roles and responsibilities of different levels of positions. With this program, the individuals are also informed regarding the organizational culture in their professional environment and work-life balance in general.

Partnered universities and colleges of A One Global Consultants offer this program to the students who plan on doing their undergrad degrees from the concerned institute. These initiatives aid participants in networking with business executives and job-seeking assistance. If you choose to pursue a profession in the host nation, this program will be among the most beneficial.

Besides this, we also strongly advise our prospective students who are enrolled in our English test preparation classes or pushing ahead with their documentation to also utilize their time by gaining skills that will help them become more eligible for Part Time Jobs in their destination countries.

Some of the Skills one can gain are ;

  1. Data Entry
  2. Content Writer
  3. Driving License
  4. Barista
  5. Baker
  6. Waiting Staff
  7. Cook | Kitchen Hand
  8. Cashier
